snippet: The Legislature approved a measure, part of the federal Affordable Care Act, to broaden coverage to 1.4 million low-income people in the state.
abstract: California State Legislature passes major piece of federal Affordable Care Act, opting to expand Medicaid to 1.4 million low-income people in state as it rushes to meet deadline to complete state budget.
lead_paragraph: The Legislature approved a measure, part of the federal Affordable Care Act, to broaden coverage to 1.4 million low-income people in the state.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
